title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: A bowhead whale's DNA offers clues to fight cancer
items.description: Scientists searching for new ways to combat cancer think they may have uncovered a promising new lead in the DNA of the bowhead whale.

items.title: Restrained, Beaten, Asphyxiated: New York Prison Guards’ Brutality Grows
items.description: As frustrations among corrections officers mount, abusive treatment of inmates is rising and becoming more vicious, records and interviews show.

items.title: Rick Cotton, Head of the Port Authority, Is Stepping Down
items.description: Mr. Cotton oversaw the rebuilding of LaGuardia Airport and several other major infrastructure projects in the New York City region.

items.title: Alma Allen, American Sculptor, Is Selected for Venice Biennale
items.description: The choice of a relatively unknown artist based in Mexico City ends a chaotic, much-delayed selection process led by the State Department.

items.description: In an extraordinary journey, a Palestinian man used a jet ski to cross the Mediterranean Sea and reach Europe after he fled the war in Gaza.
